task.summary: Default task
initial commit. Added necessary projects

Initial commit adding project configurations
This commit adds initial configuration and setup for the project. It includes settings for Rider IDE, database connection settings for API and DataAccessLayer projects, and initial database migration scripts. Additionally, it integrates Git version control system for the project.

Add DataInitializer and update ApplicationDbContextModelSnapshot
Implemented a new DataInitializer class to seed data into the Project database. Additionally, updated the ApplicationDbContextModelSnapshot to reflect the latest IdentityUser and IdentityRole models configurations within the Authentication system.

Add initial configuration for ProjectAPI
Introduces all necessary services for the .NET Core web application, ProjectAPI. The services include configuring AutoMapper, enabling Swagger, adding database context for ProjectDbContext using SQL Server, and seeding initial data with the help of DataInitializer service. Controllers and https redirection have also been set up in the application pipeline.

Add Project model in DataAccessLayer
A Project record class has been added to the DataAccessLayer models. The Project model includes fields for Id, Title, Description, Content, and a List of Skills. Necessary attributes for validation such as Key, Required, and StringLength have been applied to the appropriate fields.

Add AutoMapper configuration for Project models
Automapper configuration for Project and ProjectViewModel has been added in MappingProfile class. This will streamline the mapping between the two models, making data transfer easier and more efficient.

Add ProjectController with GET methods
A new ProjectController.cs file has been added to the ProjectAPI's Controllers folder. The controller includes two GET methods, one retreiving a specific project by its id, and the other retrieving a list of all current projects. Both methods include error handling and map results through AutoMapper.

Added ProjectDbContext class
This commit introduces the ProjectDbContext class, which extends the DbContext class, in the DataAccessLayer. It also includes a DbSet property for the Project model.

Add ProjectDbContextFactory for database context setup
This commit introduces a new class 'ProjectDbContextFactory' in the DataAccessLayer. This class implements the 'IDesignTimeDbContextFactory<ProjectDbContext>' interface and it is responsible for creating and configuring the database context used for the application, utilizing a connection string provided by an appsettings.json.

Add ProjectViewModel to project API
This commit introduces a new model called ProjectViewModel in the ProjectAPI project. This model includes properties for Title, Description, Content, and a list of Skills, where Title is required and has a character length constraint of minimum 10 and maximum 200 characters.

Add ProjectAPI and update DataAccessLayer
Added new ProjectAPI with HTTP operations and project settings. Also added new migration snapshot to DataAccessLayer, outlining model structure for Project.

Add initial project files and structure
Created the initial setup for Project-2, including main solution file, controllers, views, and configuration files. This setup also includes instantiation of the HomeController as well as initial methods and routes definitions.

Update workspace configurations and commit messages
This update includes changes to workspace.xml, tasks, and commit messages. Key changes were made to "ChangeListManager" list and the addition of "GithubPullRequestsUISettings". Message options have been updated to include recent commit history.

Add new properties to Projects in database migration
This commit adds "ImageURL" and "ProjectURL" properties to the "Projects" entity in the database. It also creates a new migration file to reflect these changes. These new properties will allow to store more project related information in the database.

Add shared footer view
Created a new shared footer view file, _Footer.cshtml. This footer includes copyright information, navigation link to the homepage, and social media icons for GitHub and LinkedIn.

Add GithubProjectBox view
A new view named '_GithubProjectBox' has been added to the Shared directory. This view takes a model of 'GithubProjectModel' and displays information including the title, description, and skills associated with the project. It also includes links to the project URL.

Refactor layout file for code simplification
In _Layout.cshtml, the in-line HTML code for the header, navbar, and footer has been replaced with partial views. This makes the layout easier to manage and more readable. Additionally, an unused CSS file link has been removed.

Add Mvc.TagHelpers to _LoginPartial view
A new directive for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.TagHelpers has been added to the _LoginPartial.cshtml view. This additional directive will provide access to necessary MVC tag helpers in _LoginPartial view to optimize and ease HTML and server-side code integration.

Add new navigation bar to shared views
A new navigational bar file named "_Navbar.cshtml" has been added to the shared views directory. This bar includes links to sections in the Home controller and a button to hire the site owner.

Removed unused views and models, added new SVG icons, and updated program setup
The unused views (Error, Privacy) and ErrorViewModel were removed as they're not needed in this project. Two new SVG icons were added for UI enhancements. Updates were made to Program.cs to reflect changes in the project setup that includes adding HttpClient services, changing the connection string, and rearranging the code for readability. Changes in the _ViewImports.cshtml file remove unnecessary using statements. Workspace configurations and commit messages have been updated as well.

Add new Weather-related ViewModel classes
Introduced several new classes under the Weather namespace in ViewModel. These classes represent different weather-related data aspects like Main, Clouds, Coord, Wind, Sys, and Weather. All classes are annotated with JSON properties for data parsing. Also, added a generic WeatherModel class for better organization and flexibility.

Add WeatherApiService with Get method
A new service class, WeatherApiService, has been created. This class makes use of HttpClient and includes a Get method to fetch weather data from an API. This data is then deserialized into a Root object and returned. Currently, GetAll and Get(int id) methods throw an exception as they are yet to be implemented.

Add new SkillModel to project
A new model, SkillModel, has been added to the ViewModel folder in Project-2. It includes properties for SkillName and Description.

Refactor ProjectDbContext and update model snapshot
In this commit, ProjectDbContext has been refactored by simplifying the structure of constructors. Additionally, 'Project' in DbSet and the model snapshot has been renamed to 'GithubProject'. Two new properties 'ImageURL' and 'ProjectURL' have been added to the 'GithubProject' model.

Update mapping for project models
The mapping for project objects has been updated in the ProjectController.cs class. Previously, project objects were mapped to the "ProjectViewModel". Now, they are correctly mapped to the "GithubProjectViewModel", providing more specific and relevant mapping for Github-related project view models.

Add Newtonsoft.Json package and new folder
The Commit introduces Newtonsoft.Json package of version 13.0.3 to the Project-2. Also, a new folder titled 'FormModels' within the 'Models' directory is created to better organize the project structure.

Add Parameters.cs file with Skills and URLs
A new file called Parameters.cs has been added to the Infrastructure folder. The file includes a static list of Skills and two static URLs for GitHub and LinkedIn profiles.

Updated AutoMapper mapping for GithubProject
This commit updates the AutoMapper configuration to properly map between GithubProject and GithubProjectViewModel instead of Project to ProjectViewModel. As a result, this improves the data transfer between these models specifically for Github projects.

Add IndexViewModel in ViewModels
A new file named IndexViewModel.cs has been added under the ViewModels directory. This class include WeatherModel, GithubProjectModel, ListOfSkills, and ContactMeModel which are some of the basic entities needed for our project. This ViewModel will help to simplify passing multiple entities to the view.

Update Home Page with new sections and features
The home page of the project has been substantially updated. New sections for skills, projects, and contact form have been included. These sections feature a carousel for projects, a skills list, and a contact form. Furthermore, client-side scripting has been added for interactive carousel control.

Add IHttpService Interface with method stubs
A new IHttpService interface has been added in the Infrastructure directory of Project-2. This service interface currently only contains method stubs for GET requests and potentially for DELETE and UPDATE. Further implementation of the methods will be done as needed.

Updated HomeController to fetch data dynamically
The HomeController has been refactored to fetch weather and project data from respective services dynamically. New models have been added to facilitate this data fetch. Random hard-coded data has been replaced with actual data calls to help display dynamic content from external services like Weather and GitHub Projects.

Rename ProjectViewModel and add new properties
The class ProjectViewModel has been renamed to GithubProjectViewModel to better reflect its purpose. Additionally, two new properties, ProjectUrl and ImageUrl, have been added to the model.

Add GithubProjectModel to project
A new model named GithubProjectModel was added to the Project-2 under GithubProjects directory. This model class includes properties such as Title, Description, Content, Skills, ProjectUrl, and ImageUrl.

Renamed Project Model to GithubProject and Added URL Properties
The Project model in the DataAccessLayer has been renamed to GithubProject to more accurately represent its purpose. Two new properties, ProjectURL and ImageURL, have been added to this model.

Create GithubApiService class
Added a new class GithubApiService to handle GitHub's API calls. The class includes methods for getting individual or all projects, with the GetAll method having implemented functionality. Exception handling included for unsuccessful API calls.

Updated DataInitializer class with new GithubProject instances
The DataInitializer class was updated to use GithubProject instances instead of the generic Project type. Two Initialized projects "Blackjack", and "Babun Bank" are now included with additional fields such as Skills, ProjectURL, and ImageURL populated. These project instances are saved to the context and provide clearer, more specific test data.

Add ContactMeModel for handling contact form data
A new model class, ContactMeModel, has been created under the Project-2 Models directory. This class will handle all input data from the site's contact form, including validation for fields such as FirstName, Surname, Email, and Message.

Add API Key to appsettings.json
An API key has been added to the appsetting.json file in the 'ApiSettings' section. This change is necessary to secure API access and manage interactions effectively.
